title: Locate a Store | Baker Distributing | Baker Distributing
text: Resources Store Locator Locate a Baker Sales Center near you. Find any Baker store across the country with our easy to use interactive store locator map. Search by state, city or zip code to find a store with HVAC/R inventory within a few miles of your location. About Baker Distributing Company Baker Distributing Company is a leading national distributor of Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning equipment parts and supplies. We carry extensive product lines from more than 500 manufacturers and trusted brands including Residential HVAC, Commercial HVAC, Ductless HVAC, Commercial Refrigeration and Foodservice.
